translation.Message_0_Page_0: One of the scavenging parties just got back. They took fire from someone, probably the military. <color=legendary>Battalion Leader Aleksy</color> got hit, I put the X-rays up on the monitors in the operation room, through that door. I couldn't determine if we should remove the bullet or not, so I'll leave that choice up to you.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Being a trained doctor, I trust you'll know how to operate effectively with what we got. We've also estimated the blood in his body to be about 186 ounces. If he loses about 40% of that he'll be dead in no time. His life is in your hands, don't screw up.
